channel.title: Rt317
channel.description:
[b]RT317[/b] (RuneTopia 317), is a under ground project Ive been working on my spare time when I am not doing other stuff, it is really just a clean WinterLove server Ive been working on for a little while just doing a little here and there.
[b]Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Cleaner then almost any other WL server you will see.[/li] [li]RSBuffer - fully added, but a bug that makes log in not work. :S[/li] [li]Crash Patch - But I used the ISAACCipher from RSBuffer. :P[/li] [li]Thread-Per-Client taken out, thank you Graham.[/li] [li]No saving or loading, no npc support, no item support, no nothing really support. :P[/li][/ul]
[b]Next Release:[/b] Fixed RSBuffer bug, better player updating system, script support, even cleaner, other stuff.
[b]Notice:[/b] I will not upload any pictures since this is very very basic like I said no npc support, or item support so I can't really take any pictures. I should also add in, log in will not work because something is wrong with RSBuffer, I am not sure what is wrong really?
[b]Download Link:[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/?qw6fvu0lo7lztz1
[b]Another Notice:[/b] Yes I know it doesn't follow java conventions very well at all. Ive just been cleaning it from the server I download before. :P
[b]Credits[/b]:
[ul][li]Me[/li] [li]Blakeman8195[/li] [li]Graham[/li] [li]Zdiddy maker[/li] [li]The people who worked on WinterLove servers to bring them to were they are now.[/li][/ul]

What?

You started winterlove cleaned style coding and you busted your ass? The way you worded your sentence is hard to under stand. :S

item.title: Rt317
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

RT317 (RuneTopia 317), is a under ground project Ive been working on my spare time when I am not doing other stuff, it is really just a clean WinterLove server Ive been working on for a little while just doing a little here and there.

Features:

[ul][li]Cleaner then almost any other WL server you will see.[/li]
[li]RSBuffer - fully added, but a bug that makes log in not work. :S[/li]
[li]Crash Patch - But I used the ISAACCipher from RSBuffer. :P[/li]
[li]Thread-Per-Client taken out, thank you Graham.[/li]
[li]No saving or loading, no npc support, no item support, no nothing really support. :P[/li][/ul]

Next Release:
Fixed RSBuffer bug, better player updating system, script support, even cleaner, other stuff.

Notice:
I will not upload any pictures since this is very very basic like I said no npc support, or item support so I can’t really take any pictures. I should also add in, log in will not work because something is wrong with RSBuffer, I am not sure what is wrong really?

Download Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?qw6fvu0lo7lztz1

Another Notice:
Yes I know it doesn’t follow java conventions very well at all. Ive just been cleaning it from the server I download before.

Credits:

[ul][li]Me[/li]
[li]Blakeman8195[/li]
[li]Graham[/li]
[li]Zdiddy maker[/li]
[li]The people who worked on WinterLove servers to bring them to were they are now.[/li][/ul]
